subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. will play a series of outdoor games next season, including one between the Blackhawks and Penguins at Chicago’s Soldier Field on March 1.
snippet: The N.H.L. will play a series of outdoor games next season, including one between the Blackhawks and Penguins at Chicago’s Soldier Field on March 1.
